chapter.text: Ata 'Amru Allahi Fala Tasta`jiluhu Subhanahu Wa Ta`ala `Amma Yushrikuna
Yunazzilu Al-Mala'ikata Bir-Ruhi Min 'Amrihi `Ala Man Yasha'u Min `Ibadihi 'An 'Andhiru 'Annahu La 'Ilaha 'Illa 'Ana Fa Attaquni
Khalaqa As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđa Bil-Haqqi Ta`ala `Amma Yushrikuna
Khalaqa Al-'Insana Min Nutfatin Fa'idha Huwa Khasimun Mubinun
Wa Al-'An`ama Khalaqaha Lakum Fiha Dif'un Wa Manafi`u Wa Minha Ta'kuluna
Wa Lakum Fiha Jamalun Hina Turihuna Wa Hina Tasrahuna
Wa Tahmilu 'Athqalakum 'Ila Baladin Lam Takunu Balighihi 'Illa Bishiqqi Al-'Anfusi 'Inna Rabbakum Lara'ufun Rahimun
Wa Al-Khayla Wa Al-Bighala Wa Al-Hamira Litarkabuha Wa Zinatan Wa Yakhluqu Ma La Ta`lamuna
Wa `Ala Allahi Qasdu As-Sabili Wa Minha Ja'irun Wa Law Sha'a Lahadakum 'Ajma`ina
Huwa Al-Ladhi 'Anzala Mina As-Sama'i Ma'an Lakum Minhu Sharabun Wa Minhu Shajarun Fihi Tusimuna
Yunbitu Lakum Bihi Az-Zar`a Wa Az-Zaytuna Wa An-Nakhila Wa Al-'A`naba Wa Min Kulli Ath-Thamarati 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatan Liqawmin Yatafakkaruna
Wa Sakhkhara Lakumu Al-Layla Wa An-Nahara Wa Ash-Shamsa Wa Al-Qamara Wa An-Nujumu Musakhkharatun Bi'amrihi 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatin Liqawmin Ya`qiluna
Wa Ma Dhara'a Lakum Fi Al-'Arđi Mukhtalifaan 'Alwanuhu 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatan Liqawmin Yadhakkaruna
Wa Huwa Al-Ladhi Sakhkhara Al-Bahra Lita'kulu Minhu Lahmaan Tariyaan Wa Tastakhriju Minhu Hilyatan Talbasunaha Wa Tara Al-Fulka Mawakhira Fihi Wa Litabtaghu Min Fađlihi Wa La`allakum Tashkuruna
Wa 'Alqa Fi Al-'Arđi Rawasiya 'An Tamida Bikum Wa 'Anharaan Wa Subulaan Lla`allakum Tahtaduna
Wa `Alamatin Wa Bin-Najmi Hum Yahtaduna
Afaman Yakhluqu Kaman La Yakhluqu 'Afala Tadhakkaruna
Wa 'In Ta`uddu Ni`mata Allahi La Tuhsuha 'Inna Allaha Laghafurun Rahimun
Wa Allahu Ya`lamu Ma Tusirruna Wa Ma Tu`linuna
Wa Al-Ladhina Yad`una Min Duni Allahi La Yakhluquna Shay'aan Wa Hum Yukhlaquna
Amwatun Ghayru 'Ahya'in Wa Ma Yash`uruna 'Ayyana Yub`athuna
Ilahukum 'Ilahun Wahidun Fa-Al-Ladhina La Yu'uminuna Bil-'Akhirati Qulubuhum Munkiratun Wa Hum Mustakbiruna
La Jarama 'Anna Allaha Ya`lamu Ma Yusirruna Wa Ma Yu`linuna 'Innahu La Yuhibbu Al-Mustakbirina
Wa 'Idha Qila Lahum Madha 'Anzala Rabbukum Qalu 'Asatiru Al-'Awwalina
Liyahmilu 'Awzarahum Kamilatan Yawma Al-Qiyamati Wa Min 'Awzari Al-Ladhina Yuđillunahum Bighayri `Ilmin 'Ala Sa'a Ma Yaziruna
Qad Makara Al-Ladhina Min Qablihim Fa'ata Allahu Bunyanahum Mina Al-Qawa`idi Fakharra `Alayhimu As-Saqfu Min Fawqihim Wa 'Atahumu Al-`Adhabu Min Haythu La Yash`uruna
Thumma Yawma Al-Qiyamati Yukhzihim Wa Yaqulu 'Ayna Shuraka'iya Al-Ladhina Kuntum Tushaqquna Fihim Qala Al-Ladhina 'Utu Al-`Ilma 'Inna Al-Khizya Al-Yawma Wa As-Su'a `Ala Al-Kafirina
Al-Ladhina Tatawaffahumu Al-Mala'ikatu Zalimi 'Anfusihim Fa'alqaw As-Salama Ma Kunna Na`malu Min Su'in Bala 'Inna Allaha `Alimun Bima Kuntum Ta`maluna
Fadkhulu 'Abwaba Jahannama Khalidina Fiha Falabi'sa Mathwa Al-Mutakabbirina
Wa Qila Lilladhina Attaqaw Madha 'Anzala Rabbukum Qalu Khayraan Lilladhina 'Ahsanu Fi Hadhihi Ad-Dunya Hasanatun Wa Ladaru Al-'Akhirati Khayrun Wa Lani`ma Daru Al-Muttaqina
Jannatu `Adnin Yadkhulunaha Tajri Min Tahtiha Al-'Anharu Lahum Fiha Ma Yasha'una Kadhalika Yajzi Allahu Al-Muttaqina
Al-Ladhina Tatawaffahumu Al-Mala'ikatu Tayyibina Yaquluna Salamun `Alaykumu Adkhulu Al-Jannata Bima Kuntum Ta`maluna
Hal Yanzuruna 'Illa 'An Ta'tiyahumu Al-Mala'ikatu 'Aw Ya'tiya 'Amru Rabbika Kadhalika Fa`ala Al-Ladhina Min Qablihim Wa Ma Zalamahumu Allahu Wa Lakin Kanu 'Anfusahum Yazlimuna
Fa'asabahum Sayyi'atu Ma `Amilu Wa Haqa Bihim Ma Kanu Bihi Yastahzi'un

Wa Qala Al-Ladhina 'Ashraku Law Sha'a Allahu Ma `Abadna Min Dunihi Min Shay'in Nahnu Wa La 'Aba'uuna Wa La Harramna Min Dunihi Min Shay'in Kadhalika Fa`ala Al-Ladhina Min Qablihim Fahal `Ala Ar-Rusuli 'Illa Al-Balaghu Al-Mubinu

Wa Laqad Ba`athna Fi Kulli 'Ummatin Rasulaan 'Ani Au`budu Allaha Wa Ajtanibu At-Taghuta Faminhum Man Hada Allahu Wa Minhum Man Haqqat `Alayhi Ađ-Đalalatu Fasiru Fi Al-'Arđi Fanzuru Kayfa Kana `Aqibatu Al-Mukadhibina
In Tahris `Ala Hudahum Fa'inna Allaha La Yahdi Man Yuđillu Wa Ma Lahum Min Nasirina
Wa 'Aqsamu Billahi Jahda 'Aymanihim La Yab`athu Allahu Man Yamutu Bala Wa`daan `Alayhi Haqqaan Wa Lakinna 'Akthara An-Nasi La Ya`lamuna
Liyubayyina Lahumu Al-Ladhi Yakhtalifuna Fihi Wa Liya`lama Al-Ladhina Kafaru 'Annahum Kanu Kadhibina
Innama Qawluna Lishay'in 'Idha 'Aradnahu 'An Naqula Lahu Kun Fayakunu
Wa Al-Ladhina Hajaru Fi Allahi Min Ba`di Ma Zulimu Lanubawwi'annahum Fi Ad-Dunya Hasanatan Wa La'ajru Al-'Akhirati 'Akbaru Law Kanu Ya`lamuna
Al-Ladhina Sabaru Wa `Ala Rabbihim Yatawakkaluna
Wa Ma 'Arsalna Min Qablika 'Illa Rijalaan Nuhi 'Ilayhim Fas'alu 'Ahla Adh-Dhikri 'In Kuntum La Ta`lamuna
Bil-Bayyinati Wa Az-Zuburi Wa 'Anzalna 'Ilayka Adh-Dhikra Litubayyina Lilnnasi Ma Nuzzila 'Ilayhim Wa La`allahum Yatafakkaruna
Afa'amina Al-Ladhina Makaru As-Sayyi'ati 'An Yakhsifa Allahu Bihimu Al-'Arđa 'Aw Ya'tiyahumu Al-`Adhabu Min Haythu La Yash`uruna
Aw Ya'khudhahum Fi Taqallubihim Fama Hum Bimu`jizina
Aw Ya'khudhahum `Ala Takhawwufin Fa'inna Rabbakum Lara'ufun Rahimun
Awalam Yaraw 'Ila Ma Khalaqa Allahu Min Shay'in Yatafayya'u Zilaluhu `Ani Al-Yamini Wa Ash-Shama'ili Sujjadaan Lillahi Wa Hum Dakhiruna
Wa Lillahi Yasjudu Ma Fi As-Samawati Wa Ma Fi Al-'Arđi Min Dabbatin Wa Al-Mala'ikatu Wa Hum La Yastakbiruna
Yakhafuna Rabbahum Min Fawqihim Wa Yaf`aluna Ma Yu'umaruna
Wa Qala Allahu La Tattakhidhu 'Ilahayni Athnayni 'Innama Huwa 'Ilahun Wahidun Fa'iyaya Farhabuni
Wa Lahu Ma Fi As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Wa Lahu Ad-Dinu Wa Asibaan 'Afaghayra Allahi Tattaquna
Wa Ma Bikum Min Ni`matin Famina Allahi Thumma 'Idha Massakumu Ađ-Đurru Fa'ilayhi Taj'aruna
Thumma 'Idha Kashafa Ađ-Đurra `Ankum 'Idha Fariqun Minkum Birabbihim Yushrikuna
Liyakfuru Bima 'Ataynahum Fatamatta`u Fasawfa Ta`lamuna
Wa Yaj`aluna Lima La Ya`lamuna Nasibaan Mimma Razaqnahum Ta-Allahi Latus'alunna `Amma Kuntum Taftaruna
Wa Yaj`aluna Lillahi Al-Banati Subhanahu Wa Lahum Ma Yashtahuna
Wa 'Idha Bushira 'Ahaduhum Bil-'Untha Zalla Wajhuhu Muswaddaan Wa Huwa Kazimun
Yatawara Mina Al-Qawmi Min Su'i Ma Bushira Bihi 'Ayumsikuhu `Ala Hunin 'Am Yadussuhu Fi At-Turabi 'Ala Sa'a Ma Yahkumuna
Lilladhina La Yu'uminuna Bil-'Akhirati Mathalu As-Saw'i Wa Lillahi Al-Mathalu Al-'A`la Wa Huwa Al-`Azizu Al-Hakimu
Wa Law Yu'uakhidhu Allahu An-Nasa Bizulmihim Ma Taraka `Alayha Min Dabbatin Wa Lakin Yu'uakhkhiruhum 'Ila 'Ajalin Musammaan Fa'idha Ja'a 'Ajaluhum La Yasta'khiruna Sa`atan Wa La Yastaqdimuna
Wa Yaj`aluna Lillahi Ma Yakrahuna Wa Tasifu 'Alsinatuhumu Al-Kadhiba 'Anna Lahumu Al-Husna La Jarama 'Anna Lahumu An-Nara Wa 'Annahum Mufratuna
Ta-Allahi Laqad 'Arsalna 'Ila 'Umamin Min Qablika Fazayyana Lahumu Ash-Shaytanu 'A`malahum Fahuwa Waliyuhumu Al-Yawma Wa Lahum `Adhabun 'Alimun
Wa Ma 'Anzalna `Alayka Al-Kitaba 'Illa Litubayyina Lahumu Al-Ladhi Akhtalafu Fihi Wa Hudaan Wa Rahmatan Liqawmin Yu'uminuna
Wa Allahu 'Anzala Mina As-Sama'i Ma'an Fa'ahya Bihi Al-'Arđa Ba`da Mawtiha 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatan Liqawmin Yasma`una
Wa 'Inna Lakum Fi Al-'An`am La`ibratan Nusqikum Mimma Fi Butunihi Min Bayni Farthin Wa Damin Labanaan Khalisaan Sa'ighaan Lilsharibina
Wa Min Thamarati An-Nakhili Wa Al-'A`nabi Tattakhidhuna Minhu Sakaraan Wa Rizqaan Hasanaan 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatan Liqawmin Ya`qiluna
Wa 'Awha Rabbuka 'Ila An-Nahli 'Ani Attakhidhi Mina Al-Jibali Buyutaan Wa Mina Ash-Shajari Wa Mimma Ya`rishuna
Thumma Kuli Min Kulli Ath-Thamarati Fasluki Subula Rabbiki Dhululaan Yakhruju Min Butuniha Sharabun Mukhtalifun 'Alwanuhu Fihi Shifa'un Lilnnasi 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatan Liqawmin Yatafakkaruna
Wa Allahu Khalaqakum Thumma Yatawaffakum Wa Minkum Man Yuraddu 'Ila 'Ardhali Al-`Umuri Likay La Ya`lama Ba`da `Ilmin Shay'aan 'Inna Allaha `Alimun Qadirun
Wa Allahu Fađđala Ba`đakum `Ala Ba`đin Fi Ar-Rizqi Fama Al-Ladhina Fuđđilu Biraddi Rizqihim `Ala Ma Malakat 'Aymanuhum Fahum Fihi Sawa'un 'Afabini`mati Allahi Yajhaduna
Wa Allahu Ja`ala Lakum Min 'Anfusikum 'Azwajaan Wa Ja`ala Lakum Min 'Azwajikum Banina Wa Hafadatan Wa Razaqakum Mina At-Tayyibati 'Afabialbatili Yu'uminuna Wa Bini`mati Allahi Hum Yakfuruna
Wa Ya`buduna Min Duni Allahi Ma La Yamliku Lahum Rizqaan Mina As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Shay'aan Wa La Yastati`una
Fala Tađribu Lillahi Al-'Amthala 'Inna Allaha Ya`lamu Wa 'Antum La Ta`lamuna

Đaraba Allahu Mathalaan `Abdaan Mamlukaan La Yaqdiru `Ala Shay'in Wa Man Razaqnahu Minna Rizqaan Hasanaan Fahuwa Yunfiqu Minhu Sirraan Wa Jahraan Hal Yastawuna Al-Hamdu Lillahi Bal 'Aktharuhum La Ya`lamuna

Wa Đaraba Allahu Mathalaan Rajulayni 'Ahaduhuma 'Abkamu La Yaqdiru `Ala Shay'in Wa Huwa Kallun `Ala Mawlahu 'Aynama Yuwajjhhhu La Ya'ti Bikhayrin Hal Yastawi Huwa Wa Man Ya'muru Bil-`Adli Wa Huwa `Ala Siratin Mustaqimin
Wa Lillahi Ghaybu As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Wa Ma 'Amru As-Sa`ati 'Illa Kalamhi Al-Basari 'Aw Huwa 'Aqrabu 'Inna Allaha `Ala Kulli Shay'in Qadirun
Wa Allahu 'Akhrajakum Min Butuni 'Ummahatikum La Ta`lamuna Shay'aan Wa Ja`ala Lakumu As-Sam`a Wa Al-'Absara Wa Al-'Af'idata La`allakum Tashkuruna
Alam Yaraw 'Ila At-Tayri Musakhkharatin Fi Jawwi As-Sama'i Ma Yumsikuhunna 'Illa Allahu 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatin Liqawmin Yu'uminuna

Wa Allahu Ja`ala Lakum Min Buyutikum Sakanaan Wa Ja`ala Lakum Min Juludi Al-'An`ami Buyutaan Tastakhiffunaha Yawma Za`nikum Wa Yawma 'Iqamatikum Wa Min 'Aswafiha Wa 'Awbariha Wa 'Ash`ariha 'Athathaan Wa Mata`aan 'Ila Hinin

Wa Allahu Ja`ala Lakum Mimma Khalaqa Zilalaan Wa Ja`ala Lakum Mina Al-Jibali 'Aknanaan Wa Ja`ala Lakum Sarabila Taqikumu Al-Harra Wa Sarabila Taqikum Ba'sakum Kadhalika Yutimmu Ni`matahu `Alaykum La`allakum Tuslimuna
Fa'in Tawallaw Fa'innama `Alayka Al-Balaghu Al-Mubinu
Ya`rifuna Ni`mata Allahi Thumma Yunkirunaha Wa 'Aktharuhumu Al-Kafiruna
Wa Yawma Nab`athu Min Kulli 'Ummatin Shahidaan Thumma La Yu'udhanu Lilladhina Kafaru Wa La Hum Yusta`tabuna
Wa 'Idha Ra'a Al-Ladhina Zalamu Al-`Adhaba Fala Yukhaffafu `Anhum Wa La Hum Yunzaruna
Wa 'Idha Ra'a Al-Ladhina 'Ashraku Shuraka'ahum Qalu Rabbana Ha'uula' Shuraka'uuna Al-Ladhina Kunna Nad`u Min Dunika Fa'alqaw 'Ilayhimu Al-Qawla 'Innakum Lakadhibuna
Wa 'Alqaw 'Ila Allahi Yawma'idhin As-Salama Wa Đalla `Anhum Ma Kanu Yaftaruna
Al-Ladhina Kafaru Wa Saddu `An Sabili Allahi Zidnahum `Adhabaan Fawqa Al-`Adhabi Bima Kanu Yufsiduna

Wa Yawma Nab`athu Fi Kulli 'Ummatin Shahidaan `Alayhim Min 'Anfusihim Wa Ji'na Bika Shahidaan `Ala Ha'uula' Wa Nazzalna `Alayka Al-Kitaba Tibyanaan Likulli Shay'in Wa Hudaan Wa Rahmatan Wa Bushra Lilmuslimina
Inna Allaha Ya'muru Bil-`Adli Wa Al-'Ihsani Wa 'Ita'i Dhi Al-Qurba Wa Yanha `Ani Al-Fahsha'i Wa Al-Munkari Wa Al-Baghyi Ya`izukum La`allakum Tadhakkaruna
Wa 'Awfu Bi`ahdi Allahi 'Idha `Ahadtum Wa La Tanquđu Al-'Aymana Ba`da Tawkidiha Wa Qad Ja`altumu Allaha `Alaykum Kafilaan 'Inna Allaha Ya`lamu Ma Taf`aluna

Wa La Takunu Kallati Naqađat Ghazlaha Min Ba`di Quwatin 'Ankathaan Tattakhidhuna 'Aymanakum Dakhalaan Baynakum 'An Takuna 'Ummatun Hiya 'Arba Min 'Ummatin 'Innama Yablukumu Allahu Bihi Wa Layubayyinanna Lakum Yawma Al-Qiyamati Ma Kuntum Fihi Takhtalifuna
Wa Law Sha'a Allahu Laja`alakum 'Ummatan Wahidatan Wa Lakin Yuđillu Man Yasha'u Wa Yahdi Man Yasha'u Wa Latus'alunna `Amma Kuntum Ta`maluna
Wa La Tattakhidhu 'Aymanakum Dakhalaan Baynakum Fatazilla Qadamun Ba`da Thubutiha Wa Tadhuqu As-Su'a Bima Sadadtum `An Sabili Allahi Wa Lakum `Adhabun `Azimun
Wa La Tashtaru Bi`ahdi Allahi Thamanaan Qalilaan 'Innama `Inda Allahi Huwa Khayrun Lakum 'In Kuntum Ta`lamuna
Ma `Indakum Yanfadu Wa Ma `Inda Allahi Baqin Wa Lanajziyanna Al-Ladhina Sabaru 'Ajrahum Bi'ahsani Ma Kanu Ya`maluna
Man `Amila Salihaan Min Dhakarin 'Aw 'Untha Wa Huwa Mu'uminun Falanuhyiyannahu Hayaatan Tayyibatan Wa Lanajziyannahum 'Ajrahum Bi'ahsani Ma Kanu Ya`maluna
Fa'idha Qara'ta Al-Qur'ana Fasta`idh Billahi Mina Ash-Shaytani Ar-Rajimi
Innahu Laysa Lahu Sultanun `Ala Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Ala Rabbihim Yatawakkaluna
Innama Sultanuhu `Ala Al-Ladhina Yatawallawnahu Wa Al-Ladhina Hum Bihi Mushrikuna
Wa 'Idha Baddalna 'Ayatan Makana 'Ayatin Wa Allahu 'A`lamu Bima Yunazzilu Qalu 'Innama 'Anta Muftarin Bal 'Aktharuhum La Ya`lamuna
Qul Nazzalahu Ruhu Al-Qudusi Min Rabbika Bil-Haqqi Liyuthabbita Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa Hudaan Wa Bushra Lilmuslimina
Wa Laqad Na`lamu 'Annahum Yaquluna 'Innama Yu`allimuhu Basharun Lisanu Al-Ladhi Yulhiduna 'Ilayhi 'A`jamiyun Wa Hadha Lisanun `Arabiyun Mubinun
Inna Al-Ladhina La Yu'uminuna Bi'ayati Allahi La Yahdihimu Allahu Wa Lahum `Adhabun 'Alimun
Innama Yaftari Al-Kadhiba Al-Ladhina La Yu'uminuna Bi'ayati Allahi Wa 'Ula'ika Humu Al-Kadhibuna
Man Kafara Billahi Min Ba`di 'Imanihi 'Illa Man 'Ukriha Wa Qalbuhu Mutma'innun Bil-'Imani Wa Lakin Man Sharaha Bil-Kufri Sadraan Fa`alayhim Ghađabun Mina Allahi Wa Lahum `Adhabun `Azimun
Dhalika Bi'annahumu Astahabbu Al-Hayaata Ad-Dunya `Ala Al-'Akhirati Wa 'Anna Allaha La Yahdi Al-Qawma Al-Kafirina
Ula'ika Al-Ladhina Taba`a Allahu `Ala Qulubihim Wa Sam`ihim Wa 'Absarihim Wa 'Ula'ika Humu Al-Ghafiluna
La Jarama 'Annahum Fi Al-'Akhirati Humu Al-Khasiruna
Thumma 'Inna Rabbaka Lilladhina Hajaru Min Ba`di Ma Futinu Thumma Jahadu Wa Sabaru 'Inna Rabbaka Min Ba`diha Laghafurun Rahimun
Yawma Ta'ti Kullu Nafsin Tujadilu `An Nafsiha Wa Tuwaffa Kullu Nafsin Ma `Amilat Wa Hum La Yuzlamuna

Wa Đaraba Allahu Mathalaan Qaryatan Kanat 'Aminatan Mutma'innatan Ya'tiha Rizquha Raghadaan Min Kulli Makanin Fakafarat Bi'an`umi Allahi Fa'adhaqaha Allahu Libasa Al-Ju`i Wa Al-Khawfi Bima Kanu Yasna`una
Wa Laqad Ja'ahum Rasulun Minhum Fakadhabuhu Fa'akhadhahumu Al-`Adhabu Wa Hum Zalimuna
Fakulu Mimma Razaqakumu Allahu Halalaan Tayyibaan Wa Ashkuru Ni`mata Allahi 'In Kuntum 'Iyahu Ta`buduna
Innama Harrama `Alaykumu Al-Maytata Wa Ad-Dama Wa Lahma Al-Khinziri Wa Ma 'Uhilla Lighayri Allahi Bihi Famani Ađturra Ghayra Baghin Wa La `Adin Fa'inna Allaha Ghafurun Rahimun
Wa La Taqulu Lima Tasifu 'Alsinatukumu Al-Kadhiba Hadha Halalun Wa Hadha Haramun Litaftaru `Ala Allahi Al-Kadhiba 'Inna Al-Ladhina Yaftaruna `Ala Allahi Al-Kadhiba La Yuflihuna
Mata`un Qalilun Wa Lahum `Adhabun 'Alimun
Wa `Ala Al-Ladhina Hadu Harramna Ma Qasasna `Alayka Min Qablu Wa Ma Zalamnahum Wa Lakin Kanu 'Anfusahum Yazlimuna
Thumma 'Inna Rabbaka Lilladhina `Amilu As-Su'a Bijahalatin Thumma Tabu Min Ba`di Dhalika Wa 'Aslahu 'Inna Rabbaka Min Ba`diha Laghafurun Rahimun
Inna 'Ibrahima Kana 'Ummatan Qanitaan Lillahi Hanifaan Wa Lam Yaku Mina Al-Mushrikina
Shakiraan Li'n`umihi Ajtabahu Wa Hadahu 'Ila Siratin Mustaqim
Wa 'Ataynahu Fi Ad-Dunya Hasanatan Wa 'Innahu Fi Al-'Akhirati Lamina As-Salihina
Thumma 'Awhayna 'Ilayka 'Ani Attabi` Millata 'Ibrahima Hanifaan Wa Ma Kana Mina Al-Mushrikina
Innama Ju`ila As-Sabtu `Ala Al-Ladhina Akhtalafu Fihi Wa 'Inna Rabbaka Layahkumu Baynahum Yawma Al-Qiyamati Fima Kanu Fihi Yakhtalifuna
Ad`u 'Ila Sabili Rabbika Bil-Hikmati Wa Al-Maw`izati Al-Hasanati Wa Jadilhum Bi-Ati Hiya 'Ahsanu 'Inna Rabbaka Huwa 'A`lamu Biman Đalla `An Sabilihi Wa Huwa 'A`lamu Bil-Muhtadina
Wa 'In `Aqabtum Fa`aqibu Bimithli Ma `Uqibtum Bihi Wa La'in Sabartum Lahuwa Khayrun Lilssabirina
Wa Asbir Wa Ma Sabruka 'Illa Billahi Wa La Tahzan `Alayhim Wa La Taku Fi Đayqin Mimma Yamkuruna
Inna Allaha Ma`a Al-Ladhina Attaqaw Wa Al-Ladhina Hum Muhsinuna
